sentence: Today's session closes with the NASDAQ Composite Index volume reaching the 10th place in the top ten list for this year.
The last time the index closed above 2.35 billion shares was on Feb 05 2013.
The total shares traded for the NASDAQ was over 2.51 billion.
Advancers stocks led declining by 1.02 to 1 ratio.
There were 1277 advancers and 1247 decliners for the day.
On the NASDAQ Stock Exchange 67 stocks reached a 52 week high and 19 those reaching lows totaled.
The most active, advancers, decliners, unusual volume and most active by dollar volume can be monitored intraday on the Most Active Stocks page.
The NASDAQ 100 index closed up .09% for the day; a total of 2.76 points.
Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. ( REGN ) had the largest percent change down (-4.13%) while Comcast Corporation ( CMCSA ) had the largest percent change gain rising 3.6%.
The Dow Jones index closed down -.76% for the day; a total of -114.89 points.

The current value is 14,909.6. International Business Machines Corporation ( IBM ) had the largest percent change down (-2.32%) while Home Depot, Inc. (The) ( HD ) had the largest percent change gain rising 1.57%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
